name: Oddworld Portal
description:
Are you ODDsessed with Oddworld Inhabitants? Then this is the app for you! Keep up to date with every minutia of tidbits about Abe, Munch and the Stranger.

Sections you can access:
- Developer Diary
- Ask Alf
- Find out about all the Oddworld games
- Blog
- Download goodies such as wallpapers and more.
- Access the Oddworld Inhabitants Twitter feed directly from the app

You even get a swanky animated background, sound effects from the games and it's all for free! Download this now and you can get news at least as quickly as following @oddworldinc on Twitter, guaranteed!
